product_name: Serfas Podium Road Bike Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for either beginner or advanced riders, the women's Serfas Podium Road Bike Shoes are designed to take your performance to the next level and are great for commuting as well. New easy-release buckle and 2 rip-and-stick straps keep your feet snug and let you make quick fit adjustments on the fly. Wide toe box and soft, cushioned insoles provide superb comfort. Stiff soles deliver maximum energy transfer to the pedals. Serfas Podium Road Bike Shoes are made from lightweight synthetic leather with ventilating mesh. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for either beginner or advanced riders, the women's Serfas Podium Road Bike Shoes are designed to take your performance to the next level and are great for commuting as well.
